query: Assess structural feasibility of Solid Lipid Nanoparticle Upadacitinib

evidence: Solid Lipid Nanoparticles (SLN) composed of Cetyl Palmitate provide a rigid core at room temperature.
Rigid matrix reduces drug leakage and improves entrapment efficiency for lipophilic drugs like Upadacitinib.
Predicted to have higher thermodynamic stability than liposomes.
context.pivot_rationale: Shift from fluid-state liposomes to solid-state matrix to correct the low SR9 score.
